alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Essex; Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:03PM EDT until July 24 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clinton County in northern New York... Southeastern Franklin County in northern New York... Northwestern Essex County in northern New York... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 303 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Harrietstown, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Saranac Lake, Adirondack Regional Airport, Wilmington, Jay In Essex County, Harrietstown, Hawkeye, Union Falls, Lake Colby, Rainbow Lake, Loon Lake, Gabriels, Lake Clear, Onchiota, Vermontville, Franklin Falls, Alder Brook, Bloomingdale, and Ray Brook. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
